channel.title: Unable to connect to server regardless of what server or client source
channel.description:
I've discovered a problem when I was trying to load up a server and a client on my local computer. Regardless of what client, server or any combination of them both I used the client would close as soon as I connected.
There console reports the login and disconnect without any errors at all. I'm lost to what could be causing the problem.

item.title: Unable to connect to server regardless of what server or client source
item.dc:creator: @EwfsPrince EwfsPrince
item.description:
@EwfsPrince wrote:

With the client it loads up as usual, log in and it freezes up and it says loading… but it just halts but the client disconnects.
On other clients, the client just close.

Client:

[quote]
Exion Client Initialized, revision # 317
NPC.DAT : 1489108188
Called method225
NPC.IDX : 1489126980
Called method225
Error: T2 - 81,73,53 - 58,3221,3219 - -26,-51,-88,7,-1,16,-51,0,0,0,0,0,0,1,25,0
,1,29,1,39,1,7,1,35,1,44,1,14,0,0,0,0,0,3,40,3,55,3,51,3,52,3,53,3,54,3,56,0,0,0
,
Exception in thread “Thread-5” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10243
at client.method101(client.java:8025)
at client.method96(client.java:7794)
at client.method114(client.java:9084)
at client.mainGameProcessor(client.java:3113)
at client.processGameLoop(client.java:2266)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:101)
at client.run(client.java:4689)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
[/code]
Server side:

ChaosScape Server - Version # 121
Loading 7 files...
[Loading] 00 - NPC.list
[Loading] 01 - SPAWN1.list
[Loading] 02 - SPAWN2.list
[Loading] 03 - SPAWN3.list
[Loading] 04 - SPAWN4.list
[Loading] 05 - ITEMS.list
[Loading] 06 - SHOPS.list
[Loading] 07 - OBJECTS.list
Rounding up the amount of monkeys required to power the server...
Educating the monkeys on how to run a server....
This might take a while...
Oh well, we got there in the end!
SUCCESS!
Loading done and server was started on port 43594.
---------- New player connecting ----------
[Loading] Michael-Notebook:3055 has connected.
[Loading] testing has logged on. [UID: 999999, high]
[Loading] File not found for testing.
-------------------------------------------
[Loading] 08 - stackable.dat
[Loading] 09 - notes.dat
[Loading] 10 - twohanded.dat
[Loading] 11 - tradeable.dat
[Loading] 12 - sellable.dat
----------- Player Is Logging Out ---------
[Saving] testing's info was successfully saved.
[Logout] testing has logged out.
-------------------------------------------

Read full topic

item.title: Unable to connect to server regardless of what server or client source
item.dc:creator: @EwfsPrince EwfsPrince
item.description:
@EwfsPrince wrote:

Its happening to ANY client.
I’ve even tried using clients that were released with specific servers.
Same problem.

Read full topic
